author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus today
description: The World Health Organization has defended its response to the pandemic and warned that politicizing the crisis will result in "many more body bags," countering criticisms leveled at it by President Donald Trump.
content:
A version of this story appeared in the April 9 edition of CNN's Coronavirus: Fact vs. Fiction newsletter. Sign up here to receive the need-to-know headlines every weekday.
